name: In The Dark (itch) (BirdCat Nate, AstronomicalZ, Cristian)
name_original: In The Dark (itch) (BirdCat Nate, AstronomicalZ, Cristian)
description:
In The Dark is a short experimental horror game created as a submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

Play as a child who has found themself lost in the bowels of a mansion. Imagination soon takes hold and the lines between reality and distortion blur, and perception becomes reality.

What to expect: Run around looking for keys while avoiding monsters obeying a specific mechanic.

Team

BirdCatNate | Team Lead | Enemy Mechanics | Made game too hard

Cristian Villaran | Level Design | Atmosphere | Story

Margot Menendez | Enemy Modelling | Animations

Philip Lammes | Enemy Sound Effects| Sound Design

Michael Ilrot | Music Composition | Sound Design

All assets not made by the team are credited in-game!
